RegReg License Information¶

Software License¶

Except where otherwise noted, all RegReg software is licensed under a revised BSD license.

See our Licensing page for more details.

Except where otherwise noted, all RegReg documentation is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License.

All code fragments in the documentation are licensed under our software license.
